name: Rajesh Ramsaroop
body:
# Rajesh Ramsaroop

Website (Portfolio & Blog): [Beware of Raj](http://www.bewareofraj.com)

E-mail: [rajesh.ramsaroop@gmail.com](mailto:rajesh.ramsaroop@gmail.com)

## Objective

Looking for new opportunities in software programming and development.

## Education

**B.S. Information Technology** (Concentration in Software Development) - Georgia Gwinnett College

Expected graduation: Summer 2014

**A.A.S. Computer Programming** - Gwinnett Technical College

## Work Experience

**Android Developer** (GGC-ITEC) _January 2013 - Ongoing_
* Worked as part of a team to develop an app for Android
* Used Github to manage and share code among team members
* Communicated ideas (written and verbal) to other team members
* Wrote maintainable code with good organization and commenting


**Desktop Support Intern** (Cornerstone Media Group) _September 2011 - May 2012_
* Provided technical support for client’s web sites
* Identified problems with client web sites and provided solutions
* Maintained client’s web sites
* Programmed web sites for clients according to their needs

## Skills

Android, iOS/X-Code/Objective C, Git, PHP, Java, C, Ruby/Ruby on Rails, SQL Lite, MySQL, XHTML/HTML, CSS, Processing, blogging web sites and software,  E-Commerce software, content management systems (CMS) software, WordPress, forum/discussion board software, Apache Web Server, Microsoft IIS Web server, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Fireworks, Flash, Eclipse IDE, setting up domain names, e-mail and web hosting, Microsoft Windows, Microsoft Office, Open Office, Mac OS

## References

Available upon request.
